body: wow her change of heart was so sudden, author could've thrown in mind control and it'd be more reasonable.  story was too creepy for me.  would've been funnier to see her become a prostitute and move along with life just to stick it to the yandere
They should've switched back, this is shit. Worst kind of yandere ever, I would only forgive her if she gave me my body back

I hate this, the Yandere is twisted and cruel. Stealing someone’s life that they worked hard for and taking advantage of them in their vulnerable state is terrible. I honestly was disappointed and don’t condone of this relationship.
wholesome end

Felt conflicted at first, then it disappeared mid way.
Amazing art. But the story had me going. Although it was shallow in plot, i stopped pulling my pud and just started read. Like, what the fuck is happening?? But this art is elite tier, so i stayed.
i really love the art but the story oh my fucking god what a ride

This is bless and curse
-Big Smoke 1992

Honestly I would’ve preferred some hate sex that slowly developed into clinging instead of the forced love plot. The brother shit was out of nowhere and unnecessary, I do like the eventual ending tho just not any of the shit in the middle.

Honestly, awful. Would've been saved without the sudden forced love ending, make this longer, and have him spend more time trying to get his life back. Use his head, try to get past all the set backs that he had been given, do something to prove without a doubt that the swapper is an imposter like sending information to his parents that only he would know, and ask them to quiz him on it. Do something so it's not just "eh, i give up, fuck me".

We can still keep the sex elements of him masturbating and getting taken advantage of, but the focus being him trying to find a way to reverse the situation, that it's not just the swapper getting scott free with the consequences. Would've been really fun for him and his old GF to speak, starting off pissed but her realizing "wait a second, how would she know this, I know only he did" to the point where they team up. Make it a fun ending where the yandere dickhead isn't just getting everything they want essentially for free, cause fuck that.
This is so weird I can't get hard
Wholesome; need more yandere content with hot dudes (would be better with no body swap, but marriage and pregnancy make up for it)
interesting plot, not the type of stuff I'd fap to though.

Well..... Your body getting swapped by somr Yandere is suck, i know that but... Atleast her body is thicc and worth it than your actual girlfriend. Imagine being able to touch big boobs and knowing it was your own... Hehe
Horrid. I can’t get off to this.

Honestly, scrap the ending, make it longer and you would have a pretty strong psychological horror. The change of heart "I love you" is so sudden, it feels forced and like the dude no longer was himself anymore, scary shit.

Yikes. If his brain started to becoming like hers, shouldn't that be the same for her. Like, I know she was able to do everything he could, but what about his old feelings and relationships? Seems like an unbalanced spell.
Bad end/Good end i guess?
The worst kind of yandere. THE ONE THAT BODY SWAPS. Isn't this more of a narcissist thing since your really just banging yourself?

Kinda wholesome.
Just imagine someone taking over your life and you can't do anything about it, it's very scary..
oh my.. i love this

This shit is terrifying. I've always liked body swap/gender bender stuff but identity death is like my biggest fear. Just having your entire life being taken over with everyone you know and love becoming a stranger is a concept that really hits for me, probably because interpersonal connections are the main things keeping me going and I don't have a very strong sense of identity. This would be cool material for a horror story but for something people are meant to masturbate to this is super weird.

Why you guys think this is a worst thing to ever exist. Look, he have a good family and can have life as a normal woman even it's mean he lost his past male life. I know that sound bad but there is far worst fate out there that made this look like a good life in an instant.
Bruh the story of this one gave me brain aneurysm
I am existing, this does too.
Fucking scary wtf
the art's really good but the story is an absolute horror show, I feel very uncomfortable reading this

mmmh I like "Identity death" tropes, but the pacing in this one was a bit weird. Her change of heart is way too abrupt and came out of nowhere. A bit disappointed cause I really liked the initial idea, but the execution was lacking. Still really love this author though, their gender bender doujin always look fantastic.
@Draziti I very much agree.
